title: Smart Home Hub
short_description: Centralized control system for home automation using IoT.
full_description: A unified interface to control lighting, climate, and security systems. Built with ESP32 microcontrollers and a React dashboard.

title: Autonomous Line Follower
short_description: Robotics car capable of following complex paths.
full_description: An educational robotics project demonstrating PID control algorithms. The robot uses infrared sensors to track black lines on white surfaces with high precision.

title: IoT Weather Station
full_description: Collects temperature, humidity, and pressure data and transmits it to the cloud. Features solar power for remote operation.

title: Smart Irrigation System
short_description: Automated plant watering based on soil moisture.
full_description: An intelligent system that monitors soil moisture levels and automatically waters plants when needed, preventing over or under-watering.
